belongs_to_collection.name: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi no Video Collection

original_title: ほんとにあった! 呪いのビデオ 25
overview: A collection of shivering psychic images received by general posts, "It really was! A video of the curse." Fear grows! Earthbound spirits, vengeful spirits, floating spirits, guardian spirits... It's full of mysterious images that can't be solved by science, including 'Half-faced man', 'Creepy woman', 'Rock-climbing', 'My girlfriend', 'Safari park', 'Household surveillance cameras' and 'Kumano Kanko'.
tagline: Can you face the truth projected by the camera?
title: Honto ni Atta! Noroi no Video Vol. 25
